# hasFinishedStreaming

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the stream has provided its final iteration.

## Declaration

```swift
var hasFinishedStreaming: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This method updates [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLVisualizable/cgImage] to the next iteration.

## Seeing the next visualization

- **nextIteration()**: Advances the visualization stream to the next iteration.

items.description: Advances the visualization stream to the next iteration.
